name: CVE-2013-4420
description: Multiple directory traversal vulnerabilities in the (1) tar_extract_glob and (2) tar_extract_all functions in libtar 1.2.20 and earlier allow remote attackers to overwrite arbitrary files via a .. (dot dot) in a crafted tar file.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:feep:libtar:1.2.14:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:feep:libtar:1.2.17:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:feep:libtar:1.2.13:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:feep:libtar:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:feep:libtar:1.2.11:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:feep:libtar:1.2.15:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:feep:libtar:1.2.19:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:feep:libtar:1.2.18:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:feep:libtar:1.2.16:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
